randomSeed.INFO: RNG seed for random reservoir initalization

esn_start.INFO: Index of the original data, at which the training output y_train will begin.

esn_end.INFO: Index of the original data, at which the testing/validation output y_test will end.

trainingLength.INFO: no. time stes for the training data set

testingLength.INFO: no. time stes for the testing data set

validationLength.INFO: no. time stes for the validation data set

data_timesteps.INFO: no. time steps the orignal data has

esn_timesteps.INFO: no. total resulting time steps for the esn

n_reservoir.INFO: dimensions of reservoir state and Wres with shape (n_reservoir, n_reservoir)

extendedStateStyle.INFO: format of the extended reservoir state which is used to compute W^out. Takes value: ...

leakingRate.INFO: factor controlling the leaky integrator formulation (1 -> fully nonlinear, 0 -> fully linear)

reservoirDensity.INFO: fraction of non-zero elements of Wres

regressionParameter.INFO: ridge regression/ penalty parameter of ridge regression

bias_in.INFO: input bias in the input mapping: Win*[1;u]

bias_out.INFO: output bias in the final output mapping:  y = Wout*[outputbias; outputInputScaling*u; s]

outputInputScaling.INFO: factor by which the input data should be scaled by in the final output mapping: y = Wout*[outputbias; outputInputScaling*u; s]

inputScaling.INFO: scaling of the columns of the input matrix Win

inputDensity.INFO: fraction of non-zero elements of Win

noiseLevel_in.INFO: amplitude of the gaussian noise term inside the activation function

noiseLevel_out.INFO: amplitude of the gaussian noise term outside the activation function

weightGeneration.INFO: method the random weights Win, Wres, Wfb should be initialized

use_feedback.INFO: if True, the reservoir uses feedback weights

feedbackScaling.INFO: scaling of the columns of the feedback matrix Wfb

fit_method.INFO: method of how Wout is computed

u_train.INFO: ESN training input data, shape (trainingLength, n_input)

y_train.INFO: ESN training output data, shape (trainingLength, n_output)

u_test.INFO: ESN testing input data, shape (testingLength, n_input)

y_test.INFO: ESN testing output data, shape (testingLength, n_output)

u_val.INFO: ESN validation input data, shape (validationLength, n_input)

y_val.INFO: ESN validation output data, shape (validationLength, n_output)

test_init_input.INFO: initial input step for the start of the testing phase, shape (1, n_input)

val_init_input.INFO: initial input step for the start of the validation phase, shape (1, n_input)

x_train.INFO: (extended) reservoir state matrix of training phase, shape (1+n_input+n_reservoir,trainingLength-transientTime) or (1+n_reservoir+n_reservoir,trainingLength-transientTime)

x_test.INFO: (extended) reservoir state matrix of testing phase, shape (1+n_input+n_reservoir,testingLength) or (1+n_reservoir+n_reservoir,testingLength)

x_val.INFO: (extended) reservoir state matrix of validation phase, shape (1+n_input+n_reservoir,validationLength) or (1+n_reservoir+n_reservoir,validationLength)
